scripts.dev:citizen: yarn run build-css-citizen && cd packages/citizen && yarn start
scripts.dev:employee: yarn run build-css-employee && cd packages/employee &&  PORT=3006 yarn start
scripts.prod:citizen: yarn run go_citizen && cd packages/citizen && yarn run build
scripts.prod:employee: yarn run go_employee && cd packages/employee && yarn run build
scripts.prod:employee-mcs: yarn run go_employee_mcs && cd dev-packages/egov-uc-dev && yarn build
scripts.transpile-common-modules: run-p egov-ui-kit egov-ui-framework egov-workflow egov-tradelicence egov-uc egov-pt egov-common egov-bpa egov-wns egov-noc egov-billamend egov-bnd
scripts.transpile-employee-modules: run-p pgr-employee pt-employee egov-hrms egov-firenoc egov-abg egov-inbox
scripts.build-css-common: run-p build-css-egov-ui-kit build-css-egov-ui-framework-core build-css-egov-workflow build-css-egov-tradelicence build-css-egov-uc build-css-egov-pt build-css-egov-firenoc build-css-egov-common build-css-egov-abg build-css-egov-billamend build-css-egov-bpa build-css-egov-wns build-css-egov-noc build-css-egov-bnd
scripts.go: yarn && yarn run build-css-employee && yarn run build-css-citizen && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules && yarn run transpile-citizen-modules && yarn run transpile-employee-modules && lerna bootstrap
scripts.go_employee: yarn && yarn run build-css-employee  && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules  && yarn run transpile-employee-modules && lerna bootstrap  --ignore egov-ui-framework-core --ignore egov-ui-kit-dev --ignore RNativeApp --ignore rainmaker-citizen --ignore pgr-citizen --ignore pt-citizen  --ignore egov-hrms-dev  --ignore egov-tradelicence-dev --ignore egov-uc-dev --ignore egov-pt-dev --ignore egov-workflow-dev --ignore pt-employee-dev --ignore pt-citizen-dev --ignore pgr-employee-dev --ignore pgr-citizen-dev --ignore egov-abg-dev  --ignore egov-billamend-dev --ignore egov-firenoc-dev  --ignore egov-common-dev --ignore egov-bpa-dev --ignore egov-wns-dev --ignore egov-noc-dev --ignore egov-inbox-dev
scripts.go_citizen: yarn  && yarn run build-css-citizen && yarn run build-css-common && yarn run transpile-common-modules && yarn run transpile-citizen-modules  && lerna bootstrap  --ignore egov-ui-framework-core --ignore egov-ui-kit-dev --ignore RNativeApp --ignore rainmaker-employee --ignore pgr-employee --ignore pt-employee --ignore egov-hrms-dev  --ignore egov-tradelicence-dev --ignore egov-uc-dev --ignore egov-pt-dev --ignore egov-workflow-dev --ignore pt-employee-dev --ignore pt-citizen-dev --ignore pgr-employee-dev --ignore pgr-citizen-dev --ignore egov-abg-dev --ignore egov-billamend-dev --ignore egov-firenoc-dev  --ignore egov-common-dev --ignore egov-bpa-dev --ignore egov-wns-dev --ignore egov-hrms --ignore egov-inbox-dev --ignore egov-inbox--ignore egov-noc-dev
scripts.go_employee_mcs: yarn && yarn run build-css-common-mcs && yarn run transpile-common-modules-mcs && lerna bootstrap --ignore egov-ui-transform-service --ignore RNativeApp --ignore rainmaker-citizen --ignore rainmaker-employee --ignore pgr-citizen --ignore pgr-employee --ignore pt-citizen --ignore pt-employee --ignore egov-workflow --ignore egov-tradelicence --ignore egov-workflow --ignore egov-noc --ignore egov-ui-kit  --ignore egov-hrms-dev  --ignore egov-tradelicence-core --ignore egov-noc-dev --ignore egov-workflow-dev --ignore pt-employee-dev --ignore pt-citizen-dev --ignore pgr-employee-dev --ignore pgr-citizen-dev
scripts.pt: yarn run egov-ui-kit &&yarn run egov-ui-framework &&yarn run pt-employee  && yarn run pt-citizen && yarn run egov-pt && yarn run egov-common && yarn run egov-workflow && yarn run egov-inbox
scripts.non_pt: yarn run egov-abg &&yarn run egov-bpa &&yarn run pgr-employee  && yarn run pgr-citizen && yarn run egov-hrms && yarn run egov-noc && yarn run egov-tradelicence && yarn run egov-firenoc && yarn run egov-wns && yarn run egov-billamend && yarn run egov-uc && yarn run egov-bnd
